meanings.definition: A project or undertaking, typically one that is difficult or requires effort.
meanings.sent1: The school play was a big enterprise for the students.
meanings.sent2: Many people admire those who take on challenging enterprises.
meanings.sent3: Trying to teach a cat to swim would be quite the enterprise!
meanings.sent4: Her journey to climb the mountain was a daring enterprise.
meanings.sent5: The team's mission to explore the deep sea was a risky enterprise.

meanings.sent1: My uncle owns a small family enterprise in town.
meanings.sent2: Large enterprises often have many employees and branches.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a penguin running a fish-selling enterprise!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a successful enterprise in brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The chocolate factory was a sweet-smelling enterprise.
